description: Also called the 80/20 rule or Pareto's law.

examples.chinese: 根据二八定律,世界上80%的钱掌握在20%人的手
examples.translation: According to the Pareto Principle, 80% of the world's money is in the hands of 20% of the people.

examples.chinese: 很多行业有二八定律,即20%的人挣了80%的钱
examples.translation: Many industries follow the Pareto Principle, meaning 20% of people earn 80% of the money.
